review.author: DevOps (Codex)
review.findings: Focus-deferral fix: userInputFocused() changed from focus-only to focus+recent-activity (2s window). Added UI activity tracking via keydown+input events on non-xterm inputs. Injection gates in processIdleQueue and doSendToPane unchanged but now defer only on active typing, not mere focus. 5 new tests. Cross-model: Codex authored, Claude Opus reviewed.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
